alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Red River; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 29 at 5:44AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Webster, north central Red River, southwestern Bienville and southeastern Bossier Parishes through 630 AM CDT... At 543 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Eastwood to near Coushatta. Movement was north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Minden, Haughton, Ringgold, Sibley, Doyline, Dubberly, Dixie Inn, Heflin, Eastwood, Evergreen, Hall Summit, Jamestown, Curtis, Fillmore, Plum Orchard Landing, Loggy Bayou, Koran, Crichton, Gilark and Noles Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
